string: Ooooops ! I crashed, but a report has been sent to my developer to help him fix the issue !
"An unexpected error occurred forcing the application to stop. Please help us fix this by sending us error data, all you have to do is tap 'OK'."
You might add your comments about the problem below:
Create a backup from your data when upgrading to a newer version
Your version is up to date.

If you want to restore chats history from WhatsApp , make sure you made a backup from your messages , then you can restore it by pressing the button below , then put your number - press on ( Verify ).
